QuestData.Title: Haohan's Vote II: The Real Culprits
QuestData.Description: What are YOU doing here, citypaw?$B$BLook, I've got my hands full with a break-in at my shed to the west. Some rascals came in the middle of the night and ransacked the place.$B$BI've got missing seeds, broken tools, and eaten inventory to deal with.$B$BI'll just add it to my list of other troubles: a whole wagon of melons stolen, a broken water pump, animals ruining my harvest...$B$BI wish that I could just get to the bottom of all this already!
